title: Game crashed
body: I started a new game and 5 minutes later it started lagging, even though my ping and fps were normal. Then my music from Spotify stopped and I closed the LoL window and when I tried to open it again it just showed a black screen and nothing worked. I still heard the audio from the game. Then I had to close my computer and couldn't join the game. GG

replies.body: If you're able to hear sounds in the game but with a black screen, then a driver or hardware may have failed to render properly.  Make a custom game, and run through the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot.  It should also help by making sure your drivers are up to date.  I hope that helps!
